text: "Perfect" is a 1998 song by American band the Smashing Pumpkins and is the second single from their fourth studio album Adore. It went to number 11 in Canada, number 17 in Iceland, number 18 in New Zealand, number 24 in the United Kingdom and number 54 in the United States. == Track listings == All songs were written by Billy Corgan, except "Summer", written by James Iha.
